attributes.action: Stop the closure of Leeds Childrens Heart Unit
attributes.additional_details: The closure of the childrens heart unit in Leeds, would seriously harm the welfare of the 360+ children that are treated every year. It would also put a massive strain on their families if they had to travel 160 to 200 miles round trip. To be with their children at these terrible saddening times.

rejection.details: Please see: Save Leeds children's heart surgery
